tiles.title: Liquid 101
tiles.detail: This virtual, instructor-led, course will help you to take data collected in Braze and dynamically insert it into your messages using Liquid.

tiles.title: Liquid 102
tiles.detail: This virtual instructor-led course will help you get even more specific and personal in your messaging.

tiles.title: Create Customer Journeys with Canvas
tiles.detail: Canvas is the engine behind fantastic, personalized, automated lifecycle marketing. Want to create brilliant customer experiences in a seamless UI while simultaneously testing your efforts? We hope so. Canvas is the tool that will get you there.

tiles.title: Currents: The Basics
tiles.detail: Currents is a Braze feature that allows you to export and stream your event data to 3rd party systems to get even better insights from your users.

tiles.title: Marketing Strategy Checklists and Toolkits
tiles.detail: Get up and running with your Campaign strategy.

tiles.title: Campaign Setup: Delivery, Targeting, Conversions
tiles.detail: After you've created segments and messages for your campaign, it's time to set up delivery, targeting and conversion tracking.

tiles.title: Braze Continuum: Get the Most out of the Braze Product
Email Onboarding: Achieving High Deliverability
tiles.detail: Learn the foundational concepts of the world's biggest marketing stream in terms of ROI.
